env-bootstrap.description: Bootstraps a test environments in your workspace. Cached and ready for use.

env-setup.description: Generate and install test environments in your workspace. Cached and ready for use.

npm-publish.description: Publishes npm packages to a configured registry.

npm-install.description: Installs npm packages in your workspace.

kill-process.description: Kills process by PID, command or file path.
